page.title: 15WILMCOTE CofE (AIDED) SCHOOL
page.content: Our{primary school}has 4 classrooms,a kitchen,library,cloakroom,secretarys office,headmasters office,large hall, four toilets,a bookshop,a stockroom, and a staffroom.The staffroom has six chairs,a table,sink and a fridge.The stockroom is where paint,paper, and crisps etc are kept.Our{bookshop}opens every Wednesday and everyone can buy books and bookshop stamps.The school has 3{computers,}4 disc drives,a printer,3VDU's,a video,a television, overhead projector,slide projector & photocopier.There used to be a hall which was altered to make the cloakroom,library,and staffroom.It was originally a dormitory for people who came from{Oxford}to pray in church and was built in 1846.The kitchen was built in 1933.Where the hall is now,there used to be a play area, corridor and classroom built in 1912.
